channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游리 08:22 Run the threat of artobrats in Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community. Consider, alarm is still in:- Dnipropetrovsk region
item.description: 游리 08:22 Run the threat of artobrats in Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community. Consider, alarm is still in:- Dnipropetrovsk region#M_MAMARANETS_AMA_AMA_AMACA_AMARGANETSKA This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
